<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Form Retention](/Feats.aspx?ID=1839) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 142 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have trained your mind and body to tolerate [polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127) magic for longer periods of time, so long as you prepare for the change appropriately. When preparing a polymorph spell that lasts 1 minute and grants a battle form, you can prepare the spell in a slot 2 levels higher than normal. This doesn't grant any of the normal benefits of heightening a spell, but the spell lasts up to 10 minutes. For example, if you prepared [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=10) in a 4th-level slot with Form Retention, you would cast a 2nd-level _animal form_ that lasts for up to 10 minutes. If the spell can be Dismissed, that doesn't change.
name: Form Retention
